participant_1.background: i'm a swim coach at my local pool. my family and i are from india. i'm studying to be a computer programmer. my mother is very traditional while i prefer to be more free spirited.

participant_2.background: my father was a door to door salesman. i'm in an open polyamorous relationship. i have three dogs. i like to watch the olympics.
